ABOUT

My name is Alba (22) and I am a Visual Designer and Illustrator currently living in Madrid

I am inspired by many things, but especially: my uncle René, my roots, people and how they behave.

I like to explore everyday issues to transform problems or social cuestions through design. I seek to take my work beyond an aesthetic question, through sensibility, to transmit and provoke emotions.
